nfo.data

Class RWFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • nfo.data.RWFile

  • public abstract class RWFile
extends java.lang.Object
    Create a new RWFile object, allow to read / write nfo file and prevent not wanted overwriting.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Rio Alexandre

    • Method Detail

      • readNfoFile

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> readNfoFile(java.lang.String file)
        Reads a nfo file (i.e. encoded in cp437) and creates a list of each lines in utf-8 encoding.
        Parameters:
        file - Path of the file to read.
        Returns:
        List of each lines of the file.

      • writeNfoFile

        public static void writeNfoFile(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> list,
                java.lang.String file)
        Writes a nfo file (i.e. encoded in cp437) from a list of utf-8 lines.
        Parameters:
        list - List of utf-8 lines.
        file - Path of the output file. Can overwrites existing file.

      • readFile

        public static java.lang.String[] readFile(java.lang.String path)
        Read a file line by line.
        Parameters:
        path - Path of the file to read
        Returns:
        The content of the file in an array, each row of the array contains a line of the file.

      • readFileInString

        public static java.lang.String readFileInString(java.lang.String path)
        Read a file and put all its content into one String.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Write list of lines in a file.
        Parameters:
        lines - List of lines to write in a file.
        path - Path of the file to create.
